sentences.sContent: I have achieved varying degrees of fluency in 12 languages, and look forward to learning more.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have achieved varying degrees of fluency in 12 languages, and look forward to learning more.
sentences.sCn: 我已经在12门语言上达到了不同程度的流利，还期待学更多种语言。

words.tran: 流畅的，流利的；液态的；畅流的

remMethod.val: flu(流动) ＋ ency → 话从口中流出 → 流利
